H0.text: Nodules are balls formed by some types of minerals.

H1.text: Cancers are balls formed by some types of minerals.

H2.text: Microbes are the balls that some types of minerals form.

H3.text: Fistulas are balls that some types of minerals form.

A4.text: Minerals such as calcite, chert, apatite, anhydrite, and pyrite form nodules.

A5.text: Nodules are small, irregularly rounded masses with a contrasting composition from the enclosing sediment.
